content.text:
# 50th Golden Globe Awards

The 50th Golden Globe Awards, honoring the best in film and television for 1992, were held on Saturday January 23, 1993 at the Beverly Hilton. The nominations were announced on December 29, 1992.
Winners and nominees
— Best Director, winner]]
— Best Actor in a Motion Picture, Drama winner]]
— Best Actress in a Motion Picture, Drama winner]]
— Best Actor in a Motion Picture, Musical or Comedy winner]]
— Best Actress in a Motion Picture, Musical or Comedy winner]]
— Best Supporting Actor in a Motion Picture Drama, Musical or Comedy winner]]
— Best Supporting Actress in a Motion Picture Drama, Musical or Comedy winner]]
— Best Actor in a Television Series, Drama winner]]
— Best Actor in a Television Series, Musical or Comedy winner]]
— Best Actress in a Television Series, Drama winner]]
— Best Actress in a Television Series, Musical or Comedy winner]]
— Best Supporting Actor in a Series, Miniseries or Made for Television Film, winner]]
— Best Actor in a Miniseries or Television Movie winner]]
— Best Actress in a Miniseries or Television Film]]
